Welcome to the Open Source dGen Model Documentation!¶

The open source dGen model is an agent based model developed by NREL. Statistically representative residential and commercial agents are ingested by the model and used to forecast PV adoption based on user specified configurations like electricity rate prices, electricity load growth, solar resource factors, and much more.
